task_text: When dragging/moving any element with the mouse, only pin endpoints move while the element body stays in place. Fix so the whole element moves as a unit.
summary: Fixed geometry update pipeline so endpoint mutations in ElmGeometry also trigger element-specific recomputation via CircuitElm#setPoints(), restoring correct whole-element movement during drag.

outcome.notes: Build (including GWT compile) succeeds. Manual verification recommended: drag a few elements and confirm the entire symbol translates, not just posts.
